nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model

Class RectangleGeometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model.Geometry
      • nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model.RectangleGeometry

  • public class RectangleGeometry
extends Geometry
    Class that represents the rectangular geometry. Keeps the internal representation in a vector. Also contains the canvas and methods to draw on it.
    Author:
    Project Fingerpaint

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class nl.tue.fingerpaint.client.model.Geometry

      • isInsideDrawingArea

        public boolean isInsideDrawingArea(int x,
                          int y)
        Returns whether the position (x, y) is inside the drawing area on the canvas. Note: The border around the drawing area counts as 'outside'.
        Specified by:
        isInsideDrawingArea in class Geometry
        Parameters:
        x - The x-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        y - The y-coordinate relative to the top-left corner of the canvas
        Returns:
        True if coordinates (x, y) are inside the rectangular shaped drawing area. False otherwise.

        protected void fillWall(int xOffset,
            boolean topWall)
        Colours the inside of one of the walls of the geometry.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - The x-distance to the initial position
        topWall - true if the top wall has to be filled, false otherwise

      • drawGeometryOutline

        protected void drawGeometryOutline()
        Draws a rectangle on the canvas, starting at the upper left corner, with the total height and width of the drawing area. Note: The 0.5 and 1.5 coordinates are necessary to get solid black lines. If you just use 0 and 1, the lines appear gray instead of black, and the right and bottom lines are two pixels wide instead of 1.
        Specified by:
        drawGeometryOutline in class Geometry

      • clipGeometryOutline

        protected void clipGeometryOutline()
        Clips the drawing area, so that drawing outside of the drawing area is not possible
        Specified by:
        clipGeometryOutline in class Geometry

      • startDefineMixingStep

        protected void startDefineMixingStep(int mouseX,
                         int mouseY)
        Description copied from class: Geometry
        Together with stopDefineMixingStep(), this function checks whether the protocol should be updated by adding a new Step. This particular function only stores the coordinates of the press event, to calculate the distance travelled when the mouse or the user's finger is lifted from the canvas.
        Overrides:
        startDefineMixingStep in class Geometry
        Parameters:
        mouseX - x-coordinate of the mouseEvent.
        mouseY - y-coordinate of the mouseEvent.

      • stopDefineMixingStep

        protected void stopDefineMixingStep(int mouseX,
                        int mouseY)
        Checks whether a new Step should be added. If the MouseEvent's coordinates are near the top of the rectangular geometry, a TOP mixing step is generated; if it is near the bottom, a BOTTOM is generated. The direction of movement decides whether the movement is to the left or to the right.
        Specified by:
        stopDefineMixingStep in class Geometry
        Parameters:
        mouseX - x-coordinate of the mouseEvent.
        mouseY - y-coordinate of the mouseEvent.

      • determineSwipe

        protected MixingStep determineSwipe(int mouseX,
                        int mouseY)
        Returns the direction and wall of the current swiping movement, returns null if the swipe is not a valid swipe. Additionally draws an arrow to indicate the direction of the current swipe
        Specified by:
        determineSwipe in class Geometry
        Parameters:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the current mouse position.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the current mouse position.
        Returns:
        The direction and wall of the current swiping movement, or null if the swipe is not valid.

      • drawDistribution

        public void drawDistribution(int[] dist)

        Sets the given distribution as the current distribution, and draws it on the canvas

        Pre: dist.length == height * width of this rectangle

        Specified by:
        drawDistribution in class Geometry
        Parameters:
        dist - The distribution to be set and drawn

        Returns:

      • resetDistribution

        public void resetDistribution()
        Resets the current distribution to all white. Equivalent to calling drawDistribution with a dist parameter containing '255' at all indices (but faster)
        Specified by:
        resetDistribution in class Geometry
